languages.text: Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно восстанавливает 50% здоровья и начинает наносить больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно восстанавливает 50% здоровья и начинает наносить больше урона.
Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно восстанавливает 50% здоровья и начинает наносить больше урона.

languages.text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда у существа остается 5% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, оно восстанавливает 50% здоровья и начинает наносить больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When reaching 5% of wounds, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more damage.
When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至5%以下时，会恢复50%生命值，且所有攻击造成更高{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至5%以下时，会恢复50%生命值，且所有攻击造成更高伤害。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が5%に近づくと、この生物は体力を50%回復させ、より多くの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え始める。
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が5％に近づくと、この生物は体力を50％回復させ、より多くのダメージを与え始める。

languages.text: Al llegar al 5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, esta criatura recupera el 50 % de sus heridas y empieza a infligir más {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al llegar al 5 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, esta criatura recupera el 50 % de sus heridas y empieza a infligir más daño.

languages.text: Wenn sie 5 % an {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erreicht, regeneriert diese Kreatur 50 % ihrer Wunden und verursacht mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn sie 5% an {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erreicht, stellt diese Kreatur 50% ihrer Wunden wieder her und beginnt, mehr Schaden zu verursachen.

languages.text: Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe à 5 %, elle remonte à 50 % et la créature inflige plus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la réserve de{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature atteint 5 %, elle remonte à 50 % et la créature inflige plus de dégâts.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %5'e indiğinde %50 sağlık puanını geri kazanır ve daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} vermeye başlar.
languages.original_text: When reaching 5% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this creature restores 50% wounds and starts to deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
